__TOC__

* Ubuntu hour - lectures for beginners were held in Belgrade haklab, every Tuesday.

* On Friday 6th Sept. 2013 Balcan Computer Congress - <nowiki>[[https://balccon.org/congress/2013/wiki/index.php?title=BalCCon_06-07_September_2013|BalCCon]]</nowiki> were held. Ubuntu LoCo has presentation of local community and new Ubuntu realises.

* On Sunday 29th Sept. Software Freedom Day Party was held at the O3on galery at Belgrade.

* On Sunday 1st, 8th, 15th, 22nd and 29th September, Administration team meeting was held.
